content: I agree with you. racism and discrimination have no place in sports or any aspect of society. it is important to work towards a world where people of all races are treated with respect, equality, and dignity. while progress has been made in some areas, there is still a long way to go to eradicate these injustices completely. it is up to each individual and society as a whole to continue to actively and consciously work towards creating a more equitable and just world.
